txt.en: You have encountered Krûghu, the mysterious Dheghûn. The strange beast has entered the woods from parts unknown with his allies and are threatening the balance of the forest.
Krûghu can be found patrolling the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou have encountered Krûghu and his allies and should defeat them for the good of the people of Far Anórien.
You have defeated Krûghu and the Dheghûn's warband.
Krûghu and his warband can be found roaming the Drúadan Forest. The strange Dheghûn have entered the woods from parts unknown and are threatening the balance of the forest.
Krûghu and his allies can be found patrolling the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou have encountered Krûghu's warband and should defeat them for the good of the people of Far Anórien.
You have slain Krûghu and his allies and vanquished a threat to the safety of all that dwell within Far Anórien.
You have defeated Krûghu and his warband!
